title: Project Nemesis
author: Jeremy Robinson
synopsis: Jon Hudson, lead investigator for the Department of Homeland Security's Fusion Center-P, considers his job a joke until a Sasquatch sighting leads him to a research facility in Maine. There, he encounters Nemesis, a monstrous creature born from corporate secrets and a murdered girl's name. As Nemesis heads toward Boston, leaving destruction in its wake, Hudson must coordinate a military response to stop the monster before it annihilates the city.

title: Horus Rising
author: Dan Abnett
synopsis: In the 31st millennium, the Emperor of Mankind leads humanity in a Great Crusade to unite the galaxy. Warmaster Horus, his most trusted son, is tasked with leading the Emperor's forces. As Horus grapples with the burden of command, dark forces conspire to corrupt him and bring about the fall of mankind.

title: Armour of Faith
author: Graeme Lyon
synopsis: Ultramarines Chaplain Sentina and his squad are sent to secure a fortress on Orath, uncovering a plot to open a new Eye of Terror. As daemonic hordes attack, Sentina must prevent Chaos from consuming an entire sector, facing personal and external battles.

title: Soul Hunter
author: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
synopsis: The Night Lords, a renegade Space Marine Legion, are feared throughout the galaxy for their brutality. Talos, a warrior plagued by visions, leads his warband in a quest for vengeance against the Imperium. As they navigate the treacherous politics of the Chaos warlords, Talos must confront his own destiny.

title: Island 731
author: Jeremy Robinson
synopsis: Mark Hawkins, a former park ranger, joins a research vessel studying the Great Pacific Garbage Patch. After a storm, the crew finds themselves on a mysterious island linked to Japan's Unit 731. As crew members disappear, Hawkins uncovers that the island's horrific experiments are ongoing.
